typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{IT Asset ID} as string,
		{Qualiware IT Asset ID} as string,
		{IT Asset Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Description} as string,
		{IT Asset Type} as string,
		{IT Asset Business Area} as string,
		{IT Asset Organizational Operational Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Business Process} as string,
		{IT Asset Lifecycle} as string,
		{IT Asset Strategic Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Tactical Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Operational Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset NIS/ISO Criticality} as string,
		{IT Asset Interface ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> itassetlist
source(output(
		{IT Asset ID} as string,
		{IT Asset Name} as string,
		AuditCD as string,
		Revision as string,
		AuditCN as string,
		GovernanceState as string,
		ApprovalState as string,
		OwnedBy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> qualiwareitassets
itassetlist, qualiwareitassets join({Qualiware IT Asset ID} == qualiwareitassets@{IT Asset ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinitassets
joinitassets sink(input(
		{IT Asset ID} as string,
		{Qualiware IT Asset ID} as string,
		{IT Asset Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Description} as string,
		{IT Asset Type} as string,
		{IT Asset Business Area} as string,
		{IT Asset Organizational Operational Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Business Process} as string,
		{IT Asset Lifecycle} as string,
		{IT Asset Strategic Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Tactical Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset Operational Responsibility Name} as string,
		{IT Asset NIS/ISO Criticality} as string,
		{IT Asset Interface ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		{IT Asset ID} = itassetlist@{IT Asset ID},
		{Qualiware IT Asset ID},
		{IT Asset Name} = itassetlist@{IT Asset Name},
		{IT Asset Description},
		{IT Asset Type},
		{IT Asset Business Area},
		{IT Asset Organizational Operational Responsibility Name},
		{IT Asset Business Process},
		{IT Asset Lifecycle},
		{IT Asset Strategic Responsibility Name},
		{IT Asset Tactical Responsibility Name},
		{IT Asset Operational Responsibility Name},
		{IT Asset NIS/ISO Criticality},
		{IT Asset Interface ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
